# groupNames

**Instance Property**

The names of any groups associated with the message.

## Declaration

```swift
var groupNames: [String]? { get }
```

## Discussion

When this property contains one or more [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] objects, your search should return only messages that sent to the specified groups. Use the operator in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMessagesIntent/groupNamesOperator] property to determine whether to search for messages containing all, some, or none of the specified groups.

## Deprecated Symbols

- **init(recipients:senders:searchTerms:attributes:dateTimeRange:identifiers:notificationIdentifiers:speakableGroupNames:)**: Creates a *search messages* intent object with the specified search criteria.
- **init(recipients:senders:searchTerms:attributes:dateTimeRange:identifiers:notificationIdentifiers:groupNames:)**: Creates a *search messages* intent object with the specified search criteria.
- **groupNamesOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the group names in the search criteria.
